easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the amount of doom in play (max 5).
easyStandard.cultist: -2. If you fail, move each unengaged _Byakhee_ in play once toward the nearest investigator.
easyStandard.tablet: -3. Cancel the effects and icons of each skill card committed to this test.
easyStandard.elderThing: -2. If you fail, lose 1 resource for each point you failed by.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is the amount of doom in play.
hardExpert.cultist: -2. Move each unengaged _Byakhee_ in play once toward the nearest investigator.
hardExpert.tablet: -4. Cancel the effects and icons of each skill card committed to this test.
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you fail, lose 1 resource for each point you failed by.

xp.insight: Gained insight into the machinations of the Tattered King.
